enum.name: a5xx_tex_fetchsize
enum.doc: Size pixel to fetch, in bytes. Doesn't seem to be required, setting it to 0x0 seems to work ok, but may be less optimal.

reg32.name: RB_DEPTH_CNTL
reg32.doc: Z_TEST_ENABLE bit is set for zfunc other than GL_ALWAYS or GL_NEVER

reg32.name: RB_STENCIL_INFO
reg32.doc: Base address for stencil when not using interleaved depth/stencil

reg32.name: RB_STENCIL_PITCH
reg32.doc: pitch of stencil buffer when not using interleaved depth/stencil

reg32.name: RB_STENCIL_PITCH
reg32.doc: pitch of stencil buffer when not using interleaved depth/stencil

reg32.name: VFD_CONTROL_0
reg32.doc: STRMDECINSTRCNT is # of VFD_DECODE_INSTR registers valid
